original_text: As the appearance of the bow that is in the cloud in the day of rain, so was the appearance of the brightness round about. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the Lord. And when I saw it, I fell upon my face, and I heard a voice of one that spake.
korean_text: 그 사방 광채의 모양은 비 오는 날 구름에 있는 무지개 같으니 이는 여호와의 영광의 형상의 모양이라 내가 보고 엎드려 말씀하시는 이의 음성을 들으니라

sentences.original_text: As appearance of the bow that is in the cloud
so was appearance of the brightness round about
This was appearance of the likeness of the glory of the Lord
and I heard a voice of one that spake
